Satyricon. English

titleStmt.title: The satyr of Titus Petronius Arbiter, a Roman knight. With its fragments, recover'd at Belgrade. Made English by Mr. Burnaby of the Middle-Temple, and another hand
Satyricon. English
titleStmt.author: Petronius Arbiter.
Burnaby, William, 1672 or 3-1706.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Samuel Briscoe, at the corner of Charles Street, in Russel-Street, Covent-Garden,

notesStmt.note: "That which follows, is translated by Mr. Burnaby, of the Middle-Temple" has caption title; register and pagination are separate.
Item at reel 1769:41 incorrectly identified as Wing P1881.
Reproductions of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery ("Early English books, 1641-1700" reel 1769), and the British Library (reel 1996).
